name: Akabeko's Poster Girl, Tsubame Sanjo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and return it to your hand.

name: Emotional Strike Using All His Strength, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Beautiful Female Doctor, Megumi Takani
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand.

name: The Word “Bad” on His Back, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets the following abilities. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +3000 power." "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room]" 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Fists of Justice" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, your opponent shuffles their deck, and you deal 4 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: To Become Stronger, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Wanting the Strength to Protect" is placed on your CX area, if you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, search your deck for up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Looking for Someone Tough, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +1 level, +1500 power, and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card and the character facing this card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.

name: After Helping Someone, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 2 or lower character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText:
Kaoru: "I didn't get to say thank you
for helping me, and then saying you were
merely a rurouni... well, um..."

name: Conviction of a Man, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Timid Girl, Tsubame Sanjo
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 character with the same card name as a character on your stage, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Odd Pair, Sanosuke Sagara＆Yahiko Myojin
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.

name: Mysterious Beauty, Megumi Takani
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room. If you do, choose 1 card in your opponent's waiting room and put it into their stock.

name: Warm Rays of the Sun, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 2 "Hitokiri Battosai, Kenshin Himura" in your hand] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +2. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)

name: Zanbato User, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card has a in its trigger icon, 【STAND】 this card. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Powerful Technique Using All His Strength" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Legendary Master Swordsman, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Easy Win? Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Cross-Shaped Scar on the Cheek, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the level of the character facing this card is 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Disturbing Sight, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if your hand has 4 or more cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax card revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Wait, that's...

name: Fighter for Hire, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock]".

name: Worthy Rival in Swordsmanship, Yutaro Tsukayama
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Kaoru(薫)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText:
Looks like I'll have to settle the score
with you at some point.

name: Instructing Her Student, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Greatest Wish He Can't Give Up, Tsunan Tsukioka
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 "Beacon of a Revolution" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [Put 1 marker underneath this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room.
flavorText:
Ridiculous!
I haven't done anything meaningful yet!

name: Beauty on the Run, Megumi Takani
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When your other character with "Sanosuke(左之助)" in its card name is placed on the stage from your waiting room, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Cheeky Student, Yutaro Tsukayama
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another "Cheeky Student, Yutaro Tsukayama", all of your other ""Shinko-ryu" Master, Raijuta Isurugi" get +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's level 1 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." 【ACT】 [Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 ""Shinko-ryu" Master, Raijuta Isurugi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Sir!

name: Good-Natured, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with @ in its trigger icon, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Bombs of a Ten-Year Grudge, Tsunan Tsukioka
text: 【CONT】 If "Beacon of a Revolution" is in your marker area, and you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, you may 【REVERSE】 this card's battle opponent." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Beacon of a Revolution", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
They explode and ignite fires, so are
efficient incendiary bombs.

name: Lofty Ambitions, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it at the top or at the bottom of their deck.

name: Bursting With Rage, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax with @ in its trigger icon from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax with @ in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Formidable Enemy, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Aoshi: "Han'nya is formidable.
Not only is he an excellent master of kenpo,
he uses the deadly Shinwan Spell."

name: Guiding People, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 character with "Yahiko(弥彦)" in its card name into your waiting room] When "What One's Sword Bears" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Helps the Weak and Fights the Strong, Yahiko Myojin" in your waiting room, put it on an open position of your stage, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Samurai Descendant's Trampled Pride, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Worthy Rival in Swordsmanship, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When a climax with @ in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Helps the Weak and Fights the Strong, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets +5000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "What One's Sword Bears" is in your climax area, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Finding You Among Autumn Leaves, Kenshin Himura
Memories of the "Sekiho Army" From Younger Days
text: Your opponent puts the top 14 cards of their deck into their waiting room, and you reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText:
Sanosuke: "Then, can I use the
last name Sagara, Captain?"

name: Beacon of a Revolution
text: If you do not have a character with "Tsunan(津南)" or "Sanosuke(左之助)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order." "Choose 1 of your opponent's cost 0 or lower characters, and put it in their waiting room."
flavorText:
I made it with the knowledge of firearms I gained
in the Sekiho Army. They're bombs.

name: Fists of Justice
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Hey, hey, hey, hey! If you're distracted...

name: Wanting the Strength to Protect
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Powerful Technique Using All His Strength
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Do away with that sappy thought of not killing.

name: What One's Sword Bears
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText:
The destiny of the one I'm protecting
is on my sword.

name: Hitokiri Battosai, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Parting Words and Overflowing Tears, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax with the same card name as a climax in your waiting room, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Days of Fluttering Sakura, Kenshin Himura ＆ Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Clouds of Flowers Signalling Spring" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Divine-Speed Battojutsu, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [(2) Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 2 "Hitokiri Battosai, Kenshin Himura" in your hand] When this card attacks, if "Unwavering Conviction" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent 2 times. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Surprised Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Quiet Sense of Justice, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: Sudden Declaration of War, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand & Put 1 "Training Under the Sakura" from your climax area into your waiting room] When "Training Under the Sakura" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Hitokiri Battosai!

name: Conviction to Not Kill, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when a climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 climax with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand."

name: Descendant of a Tokyo Samurai, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When the character facing this card attacks, put the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room.

name: Swordsmanship Sweetheart, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your stock." (Climax are regarded as level 0. Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: "Hiten Mitsurugi-ryu" User, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if ""Hiten Mitsurugi-ryu"" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put all cards in your opponent's deck into their waiting room, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: The Past Evoked, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText:
Stand up, Saito.
If this is how the first battle in a decade ends,
it's quite unsatisfying, isn't it?

name: Taken Captive, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, you may choose 1 "Protecting Without Killing, Kenshin Himura" in your hand, and exchange it with this card as the defending character.
flavorText:
Jine: "If I take you hostage, Battosai will
be angered. Anger will return him to the
hitokiri that he once was."

name: Kind-Hearted Rurouni, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Protecting Without Killing, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavorText:
Jine: "I can understand that bird head
from last night, but this little girl
broke my Shin No Ippo, too?"

name: Aiming for a “Life-Giving Sword”, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, and you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 ""Hiten Mitsurugi-ryu" User, Kenshin Himura" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage." 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

name: "Kamiya Kasshin-ryu" Student, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I'll be one of your students.

name: Watching You Among Autumn Leaves, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 "Finding You Among Autumn Leaves, Kenshin Himura" get -2 cost while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your hand has 6 or less cards, and you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 "Finding You Among Autumn Leaves, Kenshin Himura", reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Revived Concern, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Megumi: "Right, Ken-san? You wouldn't mind
if I went to hang out at your place?"

name: Survivor of the "Sekiho Army", Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 2 or higher character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Indomitable Fighting Spirit, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and until the end of your opponent's next turn, that character gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Blushed Face, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Tough Guy Full of Fighting Spirit, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: A Battle She Can't Stop, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's encore step, if you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" until end of turn.

name: Standing Against Explosion Flames, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Hair Swaying in Autumn Breeze, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, you may choose 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.

name: Meiji Swordsman Romance Story
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Onslaught of Strong Enemies
text: 【COUNTER】 If you have 5 or more 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, choose 1 character in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player." Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Clouds of Flowers Signalling Spring
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Unwavering Conviction
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Unwavering Conviction
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Training Under the Sakura
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: "Hiten Mitsurugi-ryu"
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: “Gatotsu”, Hajime Saito
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Evil-Immediate-Slaughter" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, put it into your hand, choose up to 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's back stage, and put it into their waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: "Kaiten Kenbu", Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Spirit of the Oniwaban Group's Okashira" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn, and perform the following action 3 times. "Put the bottom 2 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Wolf of Mibu, Hajime Saito
text: 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Smoldering Emotions, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax triggers, choose 1 of your 《Oniwaban Group》 characters, and that character gets +500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【ACT】 Resonate [(1) Reveal 1 "Genius Onmitsu, Aoshi Shinomori" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Genius Onmitsu, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Movements Similar to Flowing Water" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot side attack." "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."

name: Spy Under the Government, Hajime Saito
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck."

name: Tenacious Shinobi, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【CONT】 Memory If "Oniwaban Group Onmitsu, Beshimi" and "Oniwaban Group Fire Master, Hyottoko" and "Oniwaban Group Guard, Shikijo" and "Oniwaban Group Secret Agent, Han'nya" are in your memory, all of your other characters with "Aoshi(蒼紫)" in their card names get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of their deck." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it in any position of your stage, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Battosai... until I kill you,
make sure nobody else kills you.

name: Captain of the Third Unitof the Shinsengumi, Hajime Saito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. if that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, you may choose 1 level 3 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card direct attacks, if "The Wolf's Fangs" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Oniwaban Group Onmitsu, Beshimi
text: 【CONT】 All of your 《Oniwaban Group》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Oniwaban Group》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Take this! Dokusatsu Rasenbyo!

name: Oniwaban Group Fire Master, Hyottoko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Oniwaban Group》 character, you may put this card into your memory. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Hyottoko right here will take you on!

name: Oniwaban Group Guard, Shikijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] When your other 《Oniwaban Group》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText:
Kanryu: "The true strongest is yours truly!
And I will prove that right now! Die!"

name: Fabricated Guise, Hajime Saito
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 "Moonlit Blade, Hajime Saito" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose this card and 1 "Moonlit Blade, Hajime Saito" marker underneath this card, and exchange them. If you do, at the end of the turn, exchange those characters.
flavorText:
I'm a medicine vendor from Tama, selling a
wonder drug called Ishida Powdered Medicine.
My name is Goro Fujita.

name: Oniwaban Group Secret Agent, Han'nya
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Oniwaban Group》, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Oniwaban Group》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your other 《Oniwaban Group》 characters, that character gets +1000 power until end of turn, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your memory.

name: Secret Sword "Tobi-Izuna", Raijuta Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 This card's battle opponent cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's character is returned to their hand from the waiting room, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 [④ Put 3 cards from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 If this card is 【STAND】 in your back stage, you may choose this card as the character that performs an attack. If you do, this card direct attacks."

name: Former Onmitsu Under the Shogun, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Until "Strongest" Adorns Their Graves, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets +5000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax with in its trigger icon in your climax area, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText:
I cannot put flowers at your graves yet.
But someday, I will make sure to...

name: Moonlit Blade, Hajime Saito
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher or there is a marker underneath this card, during your turn, all of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters get +X power. X is equal to your level ×1000. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your climax triggers, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Lost Surbordinates, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it in any position of your stage as 【REST】, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Shikijo: "It's just like what you said back then.
I am invincible..."

name: Stopped Battle, Hajime Saito
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand or move it to another open position of their stage.

name: Unfathomable Motive, Hajime Saito
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
flavorText:
Kenshin: "Hajime Saito, the Captain of the
Third Unit of the Shinsengumi. He came here
to settle the score which was left unsettled.
Or did he have a different objective?"

name: Bullet-Firing Beloved Trump Card, Kanryu Takeda
text: 【ACT】 [(3)] Deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 character with "Megumi(恵)" in its card name in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Put 1 marker underneath this card into your stock.
flavorText: How's that? Isn't it wonderful?

name: Order to Investigate, Aoshi Shinomori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, put them on the top of their deck in the original order, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText:
All right. Dig up everything about
that man's past in three days.

name: Captain of the First Unit of the Shinsengumi. Soji Okita
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent's waiting room has 3 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +4000 power." "【CONT】 Great Performance" 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your draw phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your clock. If you do not, put this card into your memory.

name: "Shinko-ryu" Master, Raijuta Isurugi
flavorText:
I am Raijuta Isurugi! I am truly concerned
about the future of swordsmanship!

name: The Strongest Group of Onmitsu
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Evil-Immediate-Slaughter
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Spirit of the Oniwaban Group's Okashira
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
You can't break my kodachi with
anything of that level.

name: Movements Similar to Flowing Water
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
Aoshi: "This makes me want the
title of strongest within our ranks!"

name: The Wolf's Fangs
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Invading Assassin, Kenshin Himura
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Search your deck for up to 1 level 2 or higher 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: He's skilled.

name: Righting a Friend's Wrongs, Kenshin Himura
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Obligation Towards a Friend, Sanosuke Sagara" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"Obligation Towards a Friend, Sanosuke Sagara" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Obligation Towards a Friend, Sanosuke Sagara" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I came here to stop your atrocious acts.

name: Sudden Join-In, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character in your center stage, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText:
The hell ya talkin' about? There's no way
I wouldn't join a fight this fun!

name: For Her Cooking to Be Praised, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters you have ×500.

name: "Kamiya Kasshin-ryu" Acting Master, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put a card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: “Zanza” Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, this card gets +3500 power until end of turn, and if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "With Ten Years' Worth of Emotions" is in your climax area, perform the following action 2 times. "You may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character, return it to your hand."
flavorText:
The dojo is a bit cramped for my partner.
Let's head out to the riverbank or something.

name: Training Under Autumn Skies, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Obligation Towards a Friend, Sanosuke Sagara
Resolute Decision, Sanosuke Sagara
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Meiji Romantic Story》, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character from your hand into your waiting room] ". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room." "Your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards from their waiting room except that card to their deck, and shuffles their deck."

name: Wandering Again
text: Choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText:
Kenshin: "I am a rurouni.
I will wander once again, that I will."

name: With Ten Years' Worth of Emotions
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Ever since the fall of the Sekiho Army,
I spent all my time in street fights!

name: Wandering Master Swordsman
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Rurouni, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Seeing Right Through, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose up to 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Sheesh. You guys are such busybodies.

name: Uneasiness Creeping In, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card frontal attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Pride as a Samurai Descendant, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Meiji Romantic Story》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I ain't no kid!

name: Housework Helper, Kenshin Himura
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Ditching your training to go out on a stroll is
not just a walk, that it isn't.

name: Waiting for Everyone's Return, Kaoru Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Meiji Romantic Story》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Decision At Dusk, Yahiko Myojin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +10000 power.

name: Battojutsu Stance, Kenshin Himura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "Rurouni, Kenshin Himura" in your hand] When this card attacks, if "Instant Unsheathe Separating Life and Death" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, put it on the top or at the bottom of their deck, and deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Instant Unsheathe Separating Life and Death
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
